sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/navbar/Navbar' import './School.css'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import './stars.css'; import Footer from "../../components/footer/Footer"; import { useNavigate, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { getSchoolByName } from '../../actions/school' import { MdLocationOn } from "react-icons/md"; import { MdLibraryAdd } from "react-icons/md" function School() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch() let { id } = useParams(); console.log(id) let nso = id.replaceAll('_', ' ') console.log(nso) const school = useSelector((state) => state.school) // const sch = school.Dorms // console.log(sch) const x = school.Dorms console.log(x) let longg; const externalImage = 'https://res.cloudinary.com/do0puhubq/image/upload/v1674985967/Schools/AUBhome_gvbnvj.jpg'; const handlebutt = (long, lat) => { navigate(`/AddDorm/${id}/${long}/${lat}`) } useEffect(() => { dispatch(getSchoolByName(id)); }, [dispatch]); return (
{school ? ( <>

{nso} Dorms

{school.City}

{school.Dorms?.length > 0 ? ( <>

Browse reviews from { school.Dorms?.length} dorms

) : (<> No Dorms have been added for this School )}
{school.Dorms?.length>0 && school.Dorms?.map((value, key) => { return (

{value.Name}

Rated: 3 stars

{value.contractInformation.Price}$ per month

{value.Reviews?.length} Reviews
) })}

NAMEEE

Rated: 3 stars

500$ per month

2 Reviews

NAMEEE

Rated: 3 stars

500$ per month

2 Reviews
) : ( <>

ボールを食べる

School does not exist

)}
) } export default School
